title: Let's go together
lyrics:
Gwaenchanh-a Alright
Gwaenchanh-a Alright
Na oneul-eun jogeum him-i deunikka
Hey my friends, my darling hold me tight
Ya geunyang us-eodo bog-i mag ondanikka

Silseonghan deus hamkke usneun geoya Give me five

Eolil jeog kkudeon kkum mos ilwoseo

Eomma pum-i geuliun ge anya

Naeil-i eojji doedeun gwaenchanh-eunikka

Jigeum pil-yohan geon kkulmas gat-eun danjam



Nado him-i deul ttaen jom gidaedo doelkka

Naega mwoleul haessdago swieodo doeneun geolkka

O sin-isiyeo nal jom bwayo

Daleun ideuldo nawa gat-eungayo

Nan an doena bwayo

Na dol-agalkkayo



No no please go on

Gyesog neom-eojyeodo i kkwag mulgo galago

Gyeolgug jeonbu baelo dollyeobad-eul tenikka

Sonhae boji malgo bad-a ga



Mwoga geuli himdeulkka geoul-e bichin nan

Solil chyeo bwado bakkwil ge hana eobsjiman ulin

Gwaenchanh-a Alright gwaenchanh-a Alright

Hamkke gajago uli da gat-i

Da gwaenchanh-a Alright



Eum mwolalkka cham mwo gat-eun i gibun

Salamdeul-ui wilodo jal deulliji anhneunde

Nega No no mwol al-a No no no

Neo honjaman geuleohdago saeng-gag mala

Sesang da ttoggatda inma



Aesseo gwaenchanh-eun cheog

Wiloleul wian-eulo samkyeobwado

Jeonhyeo pyeon-anhaji anh-a

Michin cheog gogaeleul tteolgugo ul-eo nado



O sin-isiyeo nal jom bwayo

Daleun ideuldo nawa gat-eungayo

Nan an doena bwayo

Na dol-agalkkayo



No no please go on

Gyesog neom-eojyeodo i kkwag mulgo galago

Gyeolgug jeonbu baelo dollyeobad-eul tenikka

Sonhae boji malgo bad-a ga



Mwoga geuli himdeulkka geoul-e bichin nan

Solil chyeo bwado bakkwil ge hana eobsjiman ulin

Gwaenchanh-a Alright gwaenchanh-a Alright

Hamkke gajago uli da gat-i

Da gwaenchanh-a Alright



Him-i eobs-eul ttaemada oechyeo dae

Alright alright

Sesang muneojin geosdo aninde

Alright alright alright

Himnaeja da himnaeja himdeul-eodo himnaeja

Hamkke gaja modu da Weâ€™ll go higher



Mwoga geuli himdeulkka geoul-e bichin nan

Solil chyeo bwado bakkwilge hana eobsjiman ulin

Gwaenchanh-a Alright gwaenchanh-a Alright

Hamkke gajago uli da gat-i da gwaenchanh-a Alright
